title: Source
description: Information about the original source and/or owner of this content

source_id.description: The id of this content in a foreign CMS.

source_type.description: Deprecated in 0.8.1. See `distributor.category` and `distributor.subcategory`. (Formerly: The method used to enter this content. E.g. 'staff', 'wires'.)

name.description: Deprecated in  0.8.1. See `distributor.name`. (Formerly: The human-readable name of the organization who first produced this content. E.g., 'Reuters'.)

system.description: The software (CMS or editor) that was used to enter this content. E.g., 'wordpress', 'ellipsis'.

edit_url.description: A link to edit this content in its source CMS.

trait_additional_properties.json.title: Has additional properties
trait_additional_properties.json.description: A grab-bag object for non-validatable data.
